name: js-framework-benchmark
description: Simple Benchmark for Javascript client side rendering

scripts.bench: cd webdriver-ts && cross-env LANG="en_US.UTF-8" node dist/benchmarkRunner.js
scripts.bench-all: cd webdriver-ts && npm run bench && npm run results
scripts.install-webdriver-ts: cd webdriver-ts && npm ci && npm run compile
scripts.install-local: npm run install-webdriver-ts && npm run install-webdriver-ts-results && npm run install-server
scripts.docker-start: cross-env-shell docker run --rm -d -p 8080:8080 --name js-framework-benchmark --ipc=host -v /dev/shm:/dev/shm --volume ${INIT_CWD}:/src --volume js-framework-benchmark:/build js-framework-benchmark-ubuntu
scripts.docker-build-frameworks: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark npm install && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark node rebuild-all.js --ci --docker --
scripts.docker-build-frameworks-non-ci: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark npm install && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark node rebuild-all.js --docker --
scripts.zip: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark node zip.js && docker cp js-framework-benchmark:/build/build.zip .

author: Stefan Krause
